website_summaries.verdict: A nice little kit for a party or a smaller amount of people.
pros: Basic colors designed to create many other colors
Stencils work well and don't bleed a lot
Dries quickly so it does not smudge
Paint generally comes off easily when you wash it
cons: This set does not have as much paint as others, but it can still paint dozens of faces

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. A few droplets of water will bring this paint set to life. It also includes silver and gold glitter. Colors are vibrant even on dark sin tones. Ibpainted my son's face and it lasted all day. It also washed off easily with a little water. My kid said it felt like normal as if nothing was on his face. So he was double checking all day to make sure it didn't rub off. Lol. Good purchase. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineAlways

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids party
customer_reviews.text: The kids had a blast the unicorn was perfect for my daughter's unicorn party she really enjoyed this kit. It was mess free, easy to use, variety of beautiful colors and stencils.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyEyez

customer_reviews.title: Choose a different brand!
customer_reviews.text: Package came opened and missing 3 stencils. Paint brush broke on first use.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My reviews are usually short but this one deserves a good one. Very nice kit, saved a ton of money doing simple designs at my kids birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: clmart

customer_reviews.title: A BIG HIT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter and she loved it! It comes with stick-on stencils that work great (especially if you use them on a flat area of the skin rather than on a joint). Even the most delicate stencil worked very well. I'm not sure how long the stencils will retain their stickiness once they have been used, but I think they could be used at least a few times over and the kit came with quite a few of them anyway. The kit also came with fine gold and silver glitter which she loved. I'm ordering a second kit for my other granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos enjoy face painting at carnivals, etc., but the lines are soooo long that they end up missing out on other activities. We ordered this, received it promptly and it came in handy during one super hot summer day when the kids were tired of being outside. The stencils are great, the quality of paint is excellent (just a drop or two of water gets it activated). I think we ended up painting both cheeks, arms, forearms, and I painted my own arm for practice. It didn't crack, it didn't rub off easily, nor did it irritate the skin (I have very sensitive skin). I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: These were one of the surprise Birthday gift for my son and he loved it. It was super easy to put on and easily removed without any damage to the skin. Highly recommended for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Thakur

customer_reviews.title: Harmful chemical Facepaint! Child's face broke out bad! Buyer beware of the fake reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I painted my child's face for Grinch Movie day at school. He came home and washed it off and had bumps all over his face. He now looks like he acne at the age of 8 ( just in time for the holidays). He does not have sensitive skin and has never had this reaction with any other face paints. Also he keeps staying that his creases of his mouth hurts. Not sure what that means but he definitely had a reaction to this harmful face paint. Not worth it even if it was free! I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kelz

customer_reviews.title: Nice paint and awesome stencils!
customer_reviews.text: I purchases this one and another kit - already reviewed - for a Parish Picnic where I face painted from 4p in the afternoon until 9p at night! I used mostly the other kit I had, but used THIS KIT'S stencils and glitter, as well as a couple of the colors when needed. Everything held up beautifully with the stencils sticking most of the night. May I recommend, though, the purchasing of extra stencils as the stickiness will eventually lose its stick especially if your painting for a long duration. =-)
customer_reviews.author: Anne Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great basic kit to have fun right away
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about face painting but wanted to try with our toddler. We got this because it was affordable and seemed like it had a good combination of paints, glitter, and applicators. We didn't even read any instructions - just got a little water for the paint and started painting right away and it was really fun, easy, and washed off with no problems at bath time.
customer_reviews.author: DC de DC

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this set
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old daughter asked for a face painting set for her birthday. she loves this set! it works really well and there are lots of stencils. She has already used it a handful of times with her friends! definitely would recommend for a kid starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FACE PAINT KIT!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! plenty of paint and very pigmented. I'm highly sensitive and this did not break me out. Also must be applied to dry skin for best results, (not in a hot room sweating.) Also, wish it had a pink and this would have been the ultimate set. Worth the price and i could not get this brand in craft stores to use a coupon. The 5 stars is for the quality of paint ONLY. 3 stars for making us purchase 2 kits for a full color kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For A Quick, Easy & Fun Face Paint!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful all-in-one face painting kit! I purchased 2 kits for my work fall harvest party. The guests included kids, adults, and seniors. The kits had everything needed to make me me look like a pro and I was showered with compliments. I bragged up the kits to everyone letting guests know I could not take the credit these kits were perfect! The stencils were fun and easy, the paints were colorful and dried quickly, making it a smooth transition from guest to guest...and everyone wanted sparkles added :) Thank you for a wonderful product and making a successful event even better!
customer_reviews.author: Becky M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last minute to use at my daughters birthday party. Shipping was lightening fast and it got here just in time. The stencils were fantastic, made it easy for me as an amateur to do a good job on all 17 faces. And the best part is the party lasted for 5 hours....and so did the paint!!! Those that wanted to clean it off at the end just used a baby wipe and voila! Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Dae

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great for parties or just for your kids. Lots of fun designs. You don't have to be an artist. Whenever I pull the kit out all the kids line up.
customer_reviews.author: Carin P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this paint! I used it on my 7 month old as well as his newborn cousin and it didn’t break out their skin or leave any rashes. The paint left a good solid color and is really a great quality. When it was time to take the paint off it came off super easy with just a baby wipe. Love this brand and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Back

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection of colors...including glitter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this paint set for my granddaughter, because she paints faces to keep children occupied while the adult members of her fire-spinning group practice their routines. She says this set is perfect, because it offers enough variety to paint all of the designs her little customers want: flowers, animal faces, lightening bolts, dragonflies, and other curious creatures. There are even 2 tubs of glitter that she can use for pixie dust. In addition to variety, this paint is smooth and goes on easily. It also lasts all evening and doesn’t easily rub off. As an added bonus, the set contains several sheets of stencils and also some face painting ideas for new creations.
customer_reviews.author: Allen D

customer_reviews.title: The kids all loved this!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how truly easy this was to do. I helped out at my Granddaughters birthday party, she turned 7,this was my job! I was a little intimidated but the kit had everything you will need and so easy to use. I'm 54, if I can do it, you can too! The kids were so excited and they all turned out perfect. Get creative and have some fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had no expierence doing face painting & bought this package - SO EASY to use ~ did purchase extra cosmetic sponges to help. Easy to use, fun results, easy clean up. I would recomend having a package of babywipes to clean up spills & miscues. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these face paints for a themed event and was a little worried because my skin tends to be pretty sensitive and prone to breaking out. (I am also pregnant, so non-toxic was even more important than usual). But my experience with these paints was great -- they did not irritate my skin at all. These paints were easy to use and looked great. I am not terribly creative but can follow patterns copy cool ideas I see online, and I was amazed at how easy it was to paint my own face. For 10 bucks, I'd say this set is pretty hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Missing brushes from set
customer_reviews.text: I received the paint set and brushes are missing. Also the product box is different from the advertised one, but the contents are the same. Even though the box says on the front and back -THERE ARE NO PAINT BRUSHES INSIDE so therefore the set is incomplete. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Joleen

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time. Horrible set
customer_reviews.text: Horrible paint. Dries right away and constantly have to add water so it's super light. So frusterated!!!! O and a brush came broken and the sponges are so cheap. Ugggg
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay P

customer_reviews.title: Smears easily. Red color is actually orange
customer_reviews.text: The only red color that is in the kit, is actually a dark orange. So not only is there not a red, but there isn't a way to make pink (which is used a lot in face painting). Go ahead and buy a more expensive kit with a pink already included! It also smears very easily. I painted my daughters face and within ten minutes it was messed up. She had her face painted a few months ago and it stayed on for hours so I think this kit just doesn't stay on as well as others.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Wood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beginner’s face paint. Used it for my son’s birthday. Good quality paints, easy to remove (some colors might tint the skin slightly), great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Complete Face Painting Kit for Beginner
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of face painting, comes with everything you need for a novice painter. We have not used it yet because it is not needed until August, but I wanted to make sure it came in plenty of time. This will be used for one of the activities during the summer feed the children program that offers free lunches for anyone under the age of 18 in our area. Pleased that it arrived so promptly and in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Dorenda A. Heather

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit with the kids. All weekend long we painted faces and used the stencils to create animals and designs. I really wasn't expecting much from a $10 set but it far exceeded my expectations. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Fun face painting kit
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this for my son (4y) and he liked so much that I have been buying for other kids as gifts. The stencils are durable, we used the same one several times and as long as you clean it after using it should be fine for a while. The paint did not cause any allergies on my son or his friends. Overall a good product, very fun. The packaging is kind of cheap, but I can't complain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: nozcan

customer_reviews.title: High quality paint and lots of it!
customer_reviews.text: High quality paint and lots of it! I am not an artist by any means, but I have been able to create some very fun designs for my daughter using this paint set. We use it for holidays, dress up, and a fun activity on trips. Kids love to get face painted! I took off once star because the stencils were disappointing - not thrilled with the selection, and hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: tylioromiosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Fun Family Art
customer_reviews.text: The kids are LOVING this product. Quick delivery, reasonable price, easy to use and clean up. Thank you for quarantine art fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley W

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a joint gift for my nieces and they LOVE IT! There is enough paint to do their faces several times. The paint comes dry (which is great when your item is delivered in the dead of winter and left outside) but, when a few drops of water are added the paint comes out thick and colorful. I'll be purchasing this for other children in my family!
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: All kids loved it at the party and the pics came out ...
customer_reviews.text: a HIT!! My daughter wanted to get Elsa for her birthday party but I wasn't wiling to pay $150. I browsed around for alternative and tadaaaa!!! All kids loved it at the party and the pics came out so beautifully. Just seems like a professional did their faces. The stencil is an added advantage for people like me who are not creative. The quality of the paint is good as well. It came off easily after the party and did not have any allergies on the skin. The paint merges well as well. Just a little water and mixes well and becomes painting easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lakme

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors that glide on easily. I ordered this set to use at a ...
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant colors that glide on easily. I ordered this set to use at a face painting table during a Christmas event that benefited low income families. I was very happy with the quality of the paint and the fine tip brushes were great for creating detailed imaged on tiny cheeks. The only drawback was that the set didn't include the color orange. This wasn't a huge problem because I could mix red and yellow, but it slowed me down a bit and caused the yellow to become "muddy" if I wasn't careful. However, this wouldn't stop me from purchasing this set again.

customer_reviews.title: Good kit..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my daughter. She is 4 and can easily use the stencils and paint by herself. So happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging- glitter everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Kit arrived with glitter everywhere. No sign of an e-book. No message from company like they indicate. Stencils are bizarre with only a few that could actually be used for children. Also many of the stencils are very ornate and no child would choose them. Quite disappointed in the packaging and the lack of the e-book.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma in Grand Rapids

customer_reviews.title: Great paint, but might stain
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this face paint but it might still stain some faces. Our daughter is very fair; the yellow specifically stays on her skin for days after use. We have tried all methods, short of scrubbing, to get it off her face. Still very pleased w/ the paint. Dries fast, the colors are nice, the glitter is a nice bonus. A few drops of water activates the paint and it doesn't clump or get runny.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. While the adults were attending a celebration of life BBQ, we wanted to have an activity for the kids. Older kids used the stencils with paint on the younger kids. Some went a little overboard but I was impressed at how easily it cleaned up.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use stencils
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that it had stencils. Very easy to use for non-artistic types
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Good fun activity with your kiddo
customer_reviews.text: Liked it. Used it for painting my 5 year old son's face when he was bored. He loved it, went on a bike ride and got lots of compliments! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: A fun kit for young children
customer_reviews.text: Everyday is a party with your own face painting kit! We have used this kit a lot. We do avoid using red of black around our eyes because it needs alcohol or strong cleaner to get it off after it stays on for a few hours. A fun kit for young children!
customer_reviews.author: MegTB

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Used it right away and liked the way it went on with sponges and brushes
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Fun and great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great product to give to my niece during our Mardi Gras party. Everybody got their face painted and the product is terrific! We had a lot of fun it was quite easy to use. Recommend it to anybody who's having a group get together where you can let loose and kick up your heels
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Tichelaar

customer_reviews.title: No orange or pink like pictures on the box show.
customer_reviews.text: We used this kit for painting faces at our local 4th of July celebration. It went on well but I was disappointend that the pictures on the box include face paintings with orange and pink and the box itself did not include orange and pink. The stencils are single use and worked well. Kids were happy with their free face painting we offered. I'd buy this kit again but am definitely going to look for orange and pink next time.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Face Paint and Glitter were a Hit, Room for improvement on Quakity/Selection of stencils and sponges
customer_reviews.text: The water activated paint was super easy to use. The stencil selection only last a few times which is super frustrating when you are trying to use them at a fall carnival. The selection of stencils was also disappointing, random options. Underwhelming. The sponges don’t rinse out well, so if you are trying to use them with the stencils and need to switch colors... you basically need a new sponge. I just bought a value pack at Walmart and didn’t use these.
customer_reviews.author: D MARIE

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren love it
customer_reviews.text: 2 grand-daughters, ages 7 and 4, had a marvelous time with their face-painting kit. Rainbows and butterflys [butterflies?] seem to be the subjects of choice. This game activity was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Prof Cochise

customer_reviews.title: great product but it needs more white paint
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality paint, colors are nice and vivid. The only thing I wish it had was an extra or larger white paint. I find the white color to be the most used and after painting a few faces I run out of it. Would really appreciate if the producer considered adding one more white color instead of the glitter.
customer_reviews.author: izzy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with stensils advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet, but was very dissapointed that it only came with 3 stensil sheets. The one I didn't get is the one I knew my step babies would love the most...the one with the batman and super man stensils. Overall, without using yet, seems legit. Thankfully I'm throwing a pirate themed birthday isntead of super hero. I'll make due either way.
customer_reviews.author: kca

customer_reviews.title: Good selection of colors easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to paint my children’s faces for Halloween. The set provided a great pallet of colors that were easy to blend and apply. We easily painted the kids faces four or 5 times with the paint in this set and still could paint quite a few more times.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Loved the face paint
customer_reviews.text: Loved the face paint. We used it last year for our Arts & Field Days last year and this station turned out to be a favorite by all. The adults loved it because it was easy: you just let them choose the stencil, put it on and paint over it. It relieved the stress and insecurity of not having a whole lot of artistic skill and simplified and quickened the process. Students loved it because the results turned out well and the colors were vibrant. Parents loved it because it washed off easily. Will be using it again this year for our upcoming arts and field days!
customer_reviews.author: Anita R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a block party
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my teen could set up a table at our block party for the littles in the neighborhood. It was a big hit. Did dozens of kids and the stencils had a nice selection.
customer_reviews.author: mmdeford

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids party
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a birthday party and it worked great. The person who was doing the painting for us said that the paints were too stiff to use as is and felt they needed to add a tiny bit of water to make them useable. Kids loved their designs. Stickers are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pat D

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This paint is great! Goes on very smooth and has vibrant color. It almost looks better about 10 mins after you apply it and gets a really great matte color. Also, doesn't wipe off easily on hands but use a baby wipe and it comes right off. I would and will be buying this product again in a heartbeat!!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTae

customer_reviews.title: This is the best face paint I have used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face paint I have used. My family has sensitive skin. It worked well on my 4 year old, does not run, and feels very lightweight. I painted my face too and it doesn't crack, itch, or smear. The colors blend very easily. I just wish there was an orange and a pink. Two blues (light and dark) could easily be replaced with one of those colors. I didn't use the glitter so I can't comment on them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: This is a great face paint kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great face paint kit. The paint glides on easily and has a fair amount of pigment in it. I wish the glitter pods were more of a gel glitter because the loose glitter gets very messy with the kids but I imagine the point is to press the loose glitter onto freshly painted skin. I have used other face paint sets before and they did not work as well as this kit did. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lily R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price. Stencils not so good.
customer_reviews.text: The paints are great! Super bright pigment and they mix well to creat additional shades. It did take me a lot of practice to figure out how much water to add to the pallet so the paints were a good consistency. The stencils were disappointing. I was hoping we’d be able to reuse them but the adhesive in the back is only good for one application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for little artists
customer_reviews.text: Daughter requested for her birthday. She loved it an has used it numerous times since receiving it. She was very proud of herself after painting a Superman S on her brother, then Gecko from PJ masks. She requested more colors for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Lea S

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to use for my children at home. We’ve enjoyed the set and it has worked great for what we do. I am not talented enough to do the stencils without messing up, but the sponges, brushes and make up applicator are easily used to create different styles.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha.Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Face Painting Kit
customer_reviews.text: I used this colorful face painting kit after the public reading of my children’s book PUNKIN. After listening to the story, the children were really excited to have their face painted. They enjoyed selecting a design from the kit’s several stencils. Children ended up with great designs from the kit’s wide array of paint colors. The final results looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Cazes

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Box came smashed. I thought the stencils were hard but more like thin sticky paper.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Quilatan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and service
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, seems like a good company as well that care about their services
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great palette of colors
customer_reviews.text: Very nice colors. A lot of nice stencils and easy to use for my daughter. She really enjoyed doing face painting
customer_reviews.author: Wonder W

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Entertained our kids for hours on a recent camping trip. So easy to use that our 3 yr olds were doing it with great results. I was surprised how far the paint lasted. We had 15 kids sharing one kit and even the adults joined in on the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Infected eye
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s eye was infected one day after using this product. Her first stye ever! Contacted customer service and they responded with no solution. Poor customer service. Will not be recommended this product to any friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: i have dark skin and the colours stands out, easy to clean and the kids had fun using it
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Great face paint for kid's party
customer_reviews.text: We got for my daughter's Dia de los Muertos birthday. Worked great for sugar skull faces. She loved it! We did not use the stencils, but they look cute. Easy to wipe off with just water, but did not rub off with just hands easily.
customer_reviews.author: margie

customer_reviews.title: Easy for a 12 year old to use
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter was able to use this for a church function and had no issues with the quality of paints or types of stencils. Great selection!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Carr

customer_reviews.title: Practice before you use it!
customer_reviews.text: You must mix the paint with water to use it, but if you're not careful and use too much water then it will run under the stencil and mess up the picture. Plus, the paint stains the skin, so washing it to try to fix mistakes is not really an option. If you don't really care about those things, then it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Penny G. Steagall

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the convenience of it delivered to your ...
customer_reviews.text: These face paints were used for a school carnival. The stencils help a whole bunch with application and speediness especially when there's a long line of 1st graders waiting for face paint. Good price for the convenience of it delivered to your door.
customer_reviews.author: Xandra-Liz

customer_reviews.title: The paints went on great and didn't seem to smear too easily
customer_reviews.text: The paints went on great and didn't seem to smear too easily. However, at least the light blue and red leave stains on the skin after all of the paint is washed off. A wipe down, bath, and 24 hours later and my kids still have blue stains on their faces. It would also be nice if there was a cover to put over the paints when they aren't being used.
customer_reviews.author: Elysha Oyler

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the different templates. My 10 year old loves it. I'm doing 3 stars because it has paints have a clear film to cover each color. We purchased another face paint set that has plastic covers for each color.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Paints were all dried out and not reusable. No tops on paint. Stencils were ok.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great face painting set! We used this for a school fair- the stencils and paints worked great and were easy for volunteers to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Kll799

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing colorful way to keep kids entertained at home. My kids have been having so much fun with this. they ask me to paint their faces with something each time. Super easy to clean, thou i do not like the stencil, it submerge all together so better get artist side of you to come out.
customer_reviews.author: kriti

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality, the paint didn’t stick to the brush and the stencils didn’t work well either . Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun. The paint gets behind the stencil sometimes but it’s a nice set. We use it often👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: KJ1102

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a school fundraising fair. Face painting had the longest line! This product was easy to use and had good coverage. I had to remove from one child's face with only water and no trouble
customer_reviews.author: Susan Smithsargent

customer_reviews.title: Great quality paint
customer_reviews.text: These paints and stencils are great. They are easy to use...even kids can use this on themselves.
customer_reviews.author: julia hogan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit for amateurs.
customer_reviews.text: This product served it's purpose. My 8 year old son loves creating body art and I am excited to use it with my preschoolers during our circus theme week.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Pierce

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and great colors!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy this product is to use for any level expertise from beginner to professional. I started painting the kids faces to practice for an upcoming event and a 10 yr old jumped in and began to help and then my 19 year old coworker jumped in to help as well. All of our creations came out better than we could ever imagine! 10 starts thumbs up and totally groovy products!
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE

customer_reviews.title: Ok set to get started in knowing what you want in face painting kit
customer_reviews.text: To get a deep color of the paint, you had to put a lot of layers - which then crack when your face moves. the stencils included are small, where the larger stencils available for purchase were much easier to work with and apply different colors with.
customer_reviews.author: SRJ

customer_reviews.title: Good set with gitter
customer_reviews.text: Good face painting kit. Like that they are dry so storage is a breeze and love the glitter colors. They were a hit with the girls. Colors are vivid and go on smooth. Only suggestion would to add a pink and orange.
customer_reviews.author: Mleigh

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: I little great grand daughter absolutely loves it can wear it on her arms face anything we are having so much fun
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: These were really goid face paints. I bought 2 sets to use at our church family fun day and they were a big hit. The stencils make painting faces a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Fun and worked well.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used for market days. She sold face paint for 25cents each. She was in 3rd grade. Easy for her to use. Only 1 face she had to redo too runny. Once she got the hang of the consistency, it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kennao

customer_reviews.title: First Time Face Painting
customer_reviews.text: These paints are easy and fun to work with! It was my first time painting my twins and sons face. They mixed well with a little water and the provided sponges. And the brushes are good! The hairs don't fall off like cheap brushes. The color assortment is good and the colors are easy to mix. Clean-up was also very easy! The sponges and brush rinsed off perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Darlinm1

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again. Great Fun for Parties and Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Will Buy Again. Great Fun for Parties and Halloween. My kids were so excited when this came in the mail. We used it for our superhero party to do superhero faces. Easy to use, fun and non toxic. Will be using for Halloween for sure and probably for future rainy days! The glitter is a nice tough to make the set a little different and fun.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bertram

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Foam applicator missing, one brush was missing bristles, I think done for you stencils are single use. Bigger stencils would have been better. Hard to do Superman logo when small brush is missing bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set to work with!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best face painting sets I have worked with. The paint was easy to work; a quick dip of the brush in water and paint was ready to use. The stencils were great; I used it on about 50+ kids and they are still sticky. Stencils were also easily cleaned with baby wipes and after a few uses with hand sanitizer.
customer_reviews.author: D.Davis

customer_reviews.title: Little girls love these
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her friends were so happy with these we love them
customer_reviews.author: Jesus & Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It went on smoothly and washed off easily. There was also plenty left over
customer_reviews.text: We used this to paint the faces of about 30 kids at a party. It went on smoothly and washed off easily. There was also plenty left over. It was a lot cheaper then hiring someone. The kids were thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Cute product. Only bad thing is one of the stencils was dirty and looked chewed up. My daughter wanted face painting at the pumpkin patch but we ran out of time. Great price for a chance to do multiple face paintings
customer_reviews.author: Mama Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Colours show up bright on all skin types and tutorial makes it easy to learn. Stencils dont work that well.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t good at all, used at a school fundraiser and I’m glad it wasn’t the only kit I brought. Colors are weak and not opaque.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M. Dickson

customer_reviews.title: My daughter adore it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 years old daughter odore it. and really like that she can do everything herself.
customer_reviews.author: Roman P

customer_reviews.title: This worked great for my daughter's cat party
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my daughter's cat party. The paint came off easily and there was no irritation. My daughter has sensitive skin so I was concerned she might have an issue but all went well. Overall a Success. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, though a little small.
customer_reviews.text: Very small for the money, but the paint lasts a long time. You need a good bit of water to mix in with the paints for spreading consistency. The glitter was a big hit; could have done with more glitter/more colors of glitter.
customer_reviews.author: MKB

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: your product was wonderful. I have recommended it to my fellow face painters and will continue to buy from you because of the following reasons, 1) it stayed on the childrens faces for the duration of both festivals even with them sweating 2) when it came time to remove the face paint it came off very easily 3) the paint was not sticky nor did it clump up. Thank you very much for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed using these paints. The sponges, brushes, and stencils were great add to this kit. However, the pictures on box and the downloadedable book (via the website listed) do not show you or instruct you to create the advertised designs. They were basic (how to make a flower, snowman etc.) I ended up going on Pinterest to get tutorials. Also, the light blue stains. My child had what it appeared like blue eyes-shadow up past her eyebrows for days. We will still use them, but avoiding the light blue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Used for face painting at a family reunion. Paint worked well on the skin of black children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant Colors and easy clean up.
customer_reviews.text: Paints comes off with a baby wipe. The colors are vibrant and go on easy! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, nieces and friends loved it. Hours of entertainment. No mess compared to slime and kinetic sand 😖. Highly recommended. Great gift as well. 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fraley

product_meta.title: Face Painting Kit for Kids - 32 Stencils, 8 Water Based Face Paint Colors, 2 Brushes, 2 Glitters, 2 Sponges & 2 Applicators - Video Tutorials & eBook - 100% Safe, Easy On and Off (White Box)
feature_bullets: ★ WHILE MANY FACE PAINTING KITS FOR KIDS LACK PIGMENT & are difficult to use, our Create a Face Paint Palette uses RICH PIGMENTS in 12 VIBRANT COLORS with a SMOOTH, CREAMY TEXTURE for BEAUTIFUL & EASY APPLICATION. Our stunning range of colors & 2 KIDS PAINT BRUSHES allows for awesome, COLORFUL APPEARANCE & SUPERIOR BLENDING, so your kids (or you!) can create however & whatever they want. Our face paint for kids painting kit is designed to let imaginations run wild!

★ OUR FACE PAINT KIT COMES with our 32 BEST-SELLING FACE PAINT STENCILS so you & your kids can create easy, yet super fun looks FOR BOYS & GIRLS. Great for BIRTHDAYS, HOLIDAYS, SPECIAL EVENTS, COSPLAY makeup, HALLOWEEN makeup, BABY SHOWER GAMES, or just when you need a FUN, SIMPLE ACTIVITY AT HOME. Our facepainting kit for kids & stencil designs are perfect for Halloween, Christmas, sports fans, & more. Or if you’re feeling creative, make your own designs!

★ OUR WATER-BASED PAINT kit for kids is AS EASY TO TAKE OFF AS IT IS TO APPLY! Add just a TOUCH OF WATER to make your face painting PAINTS COME TO LIFE. Then simply use SOAP & WARM WATER TO REMOVE our washable paint. No need for vigorous scrubbing or harsh cleansers, making our paints GREAT FOR YOUNG KIDS or for quickly changing looks. This COSMETIC GRADE kids face paint is HYPOALLERGENIC, PARABEN-FREE, & NON-TOXIC, making our paint washable for kids PERFECT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN!

★ BONUS FACE PAINTS DESIGN STENCILS, EBOOK AND TUTORIAL VIDEOS! Our face painting kit for kids comes with free face paint palette eBook AND VIDEOS and 32 FUN DESIGNS LAID OUT STEP-BY-STEP! It has ALL THE BASICS YOU NEED to start making awesome designs. Whether a beginner, a face paint professional, or a kid with face painting dreams, making fun designs is simple with our face painting kit body paints for adults & kids.

★ AT CREATE A FACE, WE KNOW HAVING SAFE, FUN ACTIVITIES for your kids is ESSENTIAL FOR A HAPPY HOME! That’s why we created our paint kits to KEEP YOUR KIDDOS (AND YOU!) HAPPY, ENTERTAINED, expressing their creativity—and giving you that much needed break! Yours & your family’s SATISFACTION IS OUR #1 PRIORITY. If for any reason you don’t absolutely love your face painting kits for kids non toxic set, we’ll make it right.
